channel.title: 48 Ways - Happiness: Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Weinberg, Rabbi Noah

item.title: 48 Ways - Happiness
item.description: Happiness is today's most sought after pleasure - and also the most elusive. Hear sound advice to break common unhappiness habits, regain lost optimism, and increase your energy level for a more rewarding life..
item.itunes:author: Rabbi Noah Weinberg
